unnormalised: Bore, tumkam khobor asa kitli vegim dhandeachea sonvsarant bodol zata, barem? Oxem dista ek-eka satolleant noveam padvim utpon’n zatat mhonn. Ami kainch padvim vixim uloiya jim tumkam mellonk xaktat, khas korun Bhartantlea company-anim. Mhonnje, "Chief Everything Officer" (borem, kiteak mhonnlear tem nhoi, punn laginch!) von odhik paromparik padvim poriant, konn konn asat mhonn zannam asl’lem borem.
normalised: Borem, tor tumkam khobor asa dhandeachea sonvsarant vostu kitleo vegim bodlotat, mhunnge? Dista tem dor eklea dusrea sumanant ek novem pad mel’lle dista. Aami tumkam bhetttel tea kaim padancher ulo মারুয়া, khas korun Bharoti ಕಂಪನಿಂನಿ. Mhunnje, “Mukhel Soglleam vostuncho Odhikari” (bore, te nhoi tumkam mellttat, punn lagim!) odhik poromporik padanche bhovtenniche, konn konn mhunn zannpachem borem.

unnormalised: Poilem, paromparik vostu. Tumchea CEO, CFO ani COO-nk zanno zalear tumi chukonk na. CEO, vo Chief Executive Officer, azun legit uttam kutro. Shri Mukesh Ambani vo Shrimati Roshni Nadar Malhotra sarkea konnacho vichar korat. Te jahaz cholovtat. Uprant tumkam CFO melltta, Chief Financial Officer. Te sogllea poixeancher nodor dovortat ani company khoinchea-i vellar pottacher poddona mhonn nischit kortat. Tata Sons-ant Shri Saurabh Agarwal sarkho konn. COO, Chief Operating Officer, to monis zo vellar relam cholta mhonn nischit korta, tumkam zannam asa? Disachea-disachea vevaharak samballta.
normalised: Poile suvater, poromparaik. Tumchea C-E-Os, C-F-Os, ani C-O-Os zanno zait tumi chukonant. C-E-O, vo Mukhel Cholochnni Odhikari, azunui uperli kutri asa. Mister Mukesh Ambani vo Miss Roshni Nadar Malhotra sarkhea monxancho vichar korat. Te jahaj choloytat. Magir tumkam C-F-O, Mukhel Arthik Odhikari melltta. Te sogllea poixeancher laksh dovortat ani company vegim bhonvchem nhoi mhunn dharann kortat. Tata Sonsat Mister Saurabh Agarwal sarko konn tori. C-O-O, Mukhel Cholochnni Odhikari, asa to monis tren zaiti velar cholta mhunn taka mahit asa, tumka zanna asa? Disachea kamanchi sambhall kortana.

unnormalised: Atam, thode odhik adhunik zaum-diat. Tumi aicheak disanim “Head of Growth” zatole zannam zatole. To monis koxem, vaddicher kendrit zata! Tankam marketing, vikri ani bhagidari hanchi zobabdari asli xakta - mullant, odhik grahak ani utpon’n haddta ti vostu. Vo "Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) dolanchim netrtv kortole. Tumkam Shrimati Priya Sharma, CMO, conference-ant bhetto zali mhonn ugddas asa?
normalised: Atam, thorim adhik adunik mellounk divoi. Tumka “Vordhanchi Mukeli” aizkal mellonk sakta. To monis vordhancher kendrit asa! Khoob vicharitari diis. Te bazar choloppan, vikrepannan, ani bhagidarinche mukheli asonk xokat – buniyadin, adhik grahakank ani odhikov vevonar mellounk kitemui zatlem. Vo Mukhel Bazar Choloppacho Odhikari (C-M-O) dalleank vhoddvik gheta. Tumkam conference-ant Miss Priya Sharma, C-M-O mell’lle mhunn tumkam ugddas asa?

unnormalised: Uprant tech padvim asat jeo thoddea vorsank adim astoxich nhoi. "Chief Technology Officer" (CTO) technical durusti vo "Chief Data Officer" (CDO) data-dharet nirnnayo ghet mhonn vichar korat. He lok khup mhotvache asat, khas korun atam ghoddta tea AI ani machine learning sangata. Tumi sodanch “VP of Engineering” vikas dolank netrtv kortole melltole.
normalised: Magir tech pad asat jem kaim vorsank legit asonant. “Mukhel Tantrik Odhikari” (C-T-O) tantrik dhrushtti cholouta vo “Mukhel Data Odhikari” (C-D-O) data-dharit nirnnoi gheunk dhir dita mhunn vichar korat. He lok khub mhotvache asat, khas korun sogllea A-I ani machine learning vostu zata mhunn. Tumkam choddkorun “V-P of Engineering” vikas dalleank vhoddvik gheta mellonk sakta.

unnormalised: Kitlek padvi mhotvacheo aikuk yetat punn tim kiteak kortat mhonn tumkam nischit zannam na? "Chief Strategy Officer" (CSO) sarke? Te lamb kallachem niyojan ani margdarshanon zokhmel’le asat. “Head of HR” sadharanponnan utm’motache asat, nokrir aslaeleanchi porva korn ani dor eklo khuxal asa mhonn nischit korunk (vo unneponnacher khuxal nhoi!).
normalised: Kitem mhunn tumka mhotvachem aikunk yeta punn tumka khotri nasli ki tem kitem karta mhunn? “Mukhel Stratg Odhikari” (C-S-O) sarkhem? Te lambavodiche yojnneant ani disa disache margdarxonant bhag ghetat. “H-R-achi Mukeli” chodd korun sidhi asa, kamdaranche dhoronn dovorta ani soglle kushall asat mhunn zai (vo odhik dukhhi nhoi!).

unnormalised: Ani dexacheo vibhinnotao visronakant. Zaitim Bhartiyeo company-amnim, tumkam azun legit “Director” padvi zaitim vaprun melltolem, zaitim pachim dishamni VP sarke. Tumi “Managing Director” (MD) vixim aikunk xakta je Bhartant zominicher vevhar cholovtat, punn dubavit to jagtik CEO nhoi.
normalised: Ani pradeshik porivotnonk visru naka. Bhartachea zaitea companyan, tumkam azunui “Director” pad zaite pautti vaprun mellonk xokta, chodd korun Poxchim konteksachea V-P sarkhem. Tumkam “Managing Director” (M-D) vixexan aikunk yeta jem Bharatant zomnichea cholouncher cholta, punn zaitkem mhunn jagtik C-E-O nhoi.

unnormalised: Heo padvim disha nirddesh korop mhotvachem asa netvorking khatir, company-achin rachna somzunk, ani sadharanponnan tumkam kiteakui zai tedna konnak ulo korcho mhonn zanno zanna mhonn. Mhonnche, tumkam novea vellar ek dhandeache kart melltta ek sobit title sangata, tumkam tem monis khoremponni kiteak korta mhonn somzunk thoddi sondhi melltolem! Ani ugddas dovrat, spoxthta magunk sodanch bore asat. Konnachi-i tuka sogllem zannam asa mhonn apoeksha na, bhai!
normalised: Hantuntlean cholunk jem pad mhotvachem asa jem networking, companychi sonrochna samajpachem ani samanne torar tumkam kiteak zai zalear konnak ulo মারুয়া, tem zanno zait. Tor, dusrea sumanant tumkam ek uski padachem biznes card mellttolo, tumkam atlean ek vishvachem kosllachem samarth zatlem ki to monis sochepond ki tem korta! Ani ugddas dourat, sood koronk uzar asa. Konnak legit tumkam sogllem mahit assonk mellna, bhai!
